2074120.name: Drive
2074120.description:
Illegal Racer

During the day, he works at a popular taxi company, and at night he turns in a risky game. In this situation all things may be crashed by one dangerous contract - after it his name will be blacklisted. Now, in order to stay free and maintain his reputation, he must do what he does best - masterfully escape from the chase.

An illegal racer has no goal, only a path

The elaborate open world in Night Drive gives you complete freedom of movement. Crime in the city is on the rise, corruption is on its hight. You were too visible and at one moment got on the first line of the "black list", now you cannot stay here. There is only you, the night and the road.

Police never sleep

After another dangerous contract, you failed to hide all traces behind you. For now you forced to leave this city before dawn. But the cops are on the alert and declare a hunt for you. Patrol crews blocked all possible escape routes. Only the speed and skills of the racer can save you.

From this game you can expect a lot of driving a car, some achievements by hidden objects that you can find on map if you will be very clever.

-many objects hidden on the map

-ability to drive a car

-interesting physics of the world

-magnificant buildings on the map
2074120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
